children.name: passwd
children.content:
root:x:0:0:root:/:/bin/sh
daemon:x:1:1:daemon:/:/bin/sh
bin:x:2:2:bin:/bin:
sys:x:3:3:sys:/usr/sys:
adm:x:4:4:adm:/var/adm:
uucp:x:5:5:uucp:/usr/lib/uucp:
nobody:x:60001:60001:nobody:/:
dxmail:x:100:12:DX/Mail User:/home/dxmail:/bin/ksh
hacky:x:101:100:Hacker User:/home/hacky:/bin/ksh
operator:x:102:0:System Operator:/:/bin/sh
admin:x:103:0:Administrator:/usr/admin:/bin/ksh

children.name: group
children.content:
root::0:root
other::1:
bin::2:root,bin,daemon
sys::3:root,bin,sys,adm
adm::4:root,adm,daemon
uucp::5:uucp
mail::12:dxmail
tty::7:
mem::8:
kmem::9:
users::100:hacky

children.name: shadow
children.content:
root:$1$T8kV9Xk2$pQ7mN3vR8sL1wX4yZ9bC0.:9450:0:99999:7:::
dxmail:*LK*:::::::
hacky:$1$hF2jK9mN$qR8sT3vW4xY5zA6bC7dE1.:9450:0:99999:7:::

children.name: hosts
children.content:
127.0.0.1	localhost
192.168.1.1	scohost.company.com scohost
192.168.1.2	mailserver.company.com mailserver
192.168.1.10	fileserver.company.com fileserver

children.name: motd
children.content:
SCO UNIX System V/386 Release 3.2
Copyright (C) 1976-1995 The Santa Cruz Operation, Inc.

Welcome to SCO UNIX!
For technical support, contact your system administrator.

System maintenance scheduled for Dec 15, 1995 at 02:00 AM

children.name: fstab
children.content:
/dev/root	/	sysv	defaults	1 1
/dev/u	/u	sysv	defaults	1 2
/dev/swap	none	swap	sw	0 0

children.name: inittab
children.content:
is:3:initdefault:
fs::sysinit:/etc/bcheckrc </dev/console >/dev/console 2>&1
rc::bootwait:/etc/rc </dev/console >/dev/console 2>&1
co:234:respawn:/etc/getty tty1 co_9600
1:2:respawn:/etc/getty tty1a m
2:2:respawn:/etc/getty tty2 m

children.name: profile
children.content:
# System V .profile
export PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/usr/sbin
export PS1="$ "
export TERM=vt100
export EDITOR=vi

children.name: services
children.content:
echo	7/tcp
echo	7/udp
ftp-data	20/tcp
ftp	21/tcp
telnet	23/tcp
smtp	25/tcp
time	37/tcp
time	37/udp
finger	79/tcp
http	80/tcp

children.name: protocols
children.content:
ip	0	IP
icmp	1	ICMP
igmp	2	IGMP
tcp	6	TCP
udp	17	UDP

children.name: networks
children.content:
loopback	127
company-net	192.168.1

children.name: rc
children.content:
#!/bin/sh
# System startup script
echo "Starting system services..."
/etc/syslogd
/usr/lib/sendmail -bd -q30m

children.name: messages
children.content:
Dec 11 01:15:23 scohost unix: system boot
Dec 11 01:15:45 scohost syslogd: restart
Dec 11 01:20:12 scohost sendmail: starting daemon

children.name: maillog
children.content:
Dec 10 18:45:30 scohost sendmail[156]: queue run started
Dec 10 19:15:45 scohost sendmail[156]: queue run completed

children.name: .profile
children.content:
# .profile for dxmail
PATH=/home/dxmail/bin:/bin:/usr/bin
export PATH
PS1='dxmail$ '

children.name: pp.conf
children.content:
# PP X.400 MTA Configuration
# Version 6.0

# Local MTA name
mta_name: dxmail.example.com

# X.400 O/R Address
or_name: /C=DE/ADMD=DBP/PRMD=COMPANY/O=EXAMPLE/

# Queue processing interval (seconds)
queue_interval: 300

# Maximum message size (bytes)
max_message_size: 10485760

# Routing mode
routing: table

children.name: routing.tbl
children.content:
# X.400 Routing Table
# Format: OR-Address-Pattern -> Next-Hop

/C=DE/ADMD=DBP/*          -> relay.dbp.de
/C=US/ADMD=*/*            -> x400-gw.example.com
/C=GB/ADMD=BT/*           -> bt-relay.uk
*                         -> default-relay.example.com

children.name: aliases.tbl
children.content:
# X.400 Address Aliases
# Format: Alias -> Full-OR-Address

postmaster: /C=DE/ADMD=DBP/PRMD=COMPANY/O=EXAMPLE/OU=ADMIN/S=Postmaster/
root: /C=DE/ADMD=DBP/PRMD=COMPANY/O=EXAMPLE/OU=ADMIN/S=Root/
admin: /C=DE/ADMD=DBP/PRMD=COMPANY/O=EXAMPLE/OU=ADMIN/S=Administrator/

children.name: .profile
children.content:
# .profile for hacky
PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/bin
export PATH
PS1='hacky$ '
EDITOR=vi
export EDITOR

children.name: .profile
children.content:
# System V .profile
export PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/usr/sbin
export PS1="# "
export TERM=vt100
export EDITOR=vi

children.name: .login
children.content:
# .login for root
stty erase ^H kill ^U intr ^C
